deathcommands.title: DeathCommands
text.autoconfig.deathcommands.title: DeathCommands Options
text.autoconfig.deathcommands.option.isE: This decides if the mod is enabled.
text.autoconfig.deathcommands.option.mes: These messages run, whenever you die.
text.autoconfig.deathcommands.option.amo: Specifies the amount of times the messages should be ran.
text.autoconfig.deathcommands.option.opt: This decides if the button in the options menu is enabled.
